# Hypothesis Testing

## Introduction

This lesson is about coming up with, and testing, research hypotheses. 

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this lesson, you will be able to:

1. Establish a hypothesis.
2. Define the Type I and Type II errors.
3. Calculate the p-value.
